commitResults.messageTitle: Update chatbot identity to Lee Kuan Yew
commitResults.messageBody:
- Changed name to Lee Kuan Yew
- Edited intro message to fit new persona
- Removed all references of Duke

- ChatBot class to handle all ChatBot logic instead of dumping it in
  main
- To edit main to allow reflect this intention
- End message will be called when quitting application

commitResults.messageTitle: Allow user input and ultilise ChatBot class
commitResults.messageBody:
- main program uses ChatBot class now instead of handling logic on its
  own

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement quit logic to main program
commitResults.messageBody:
- Users can now quit the application by typing "bye"
- Input kept as case insensitive
- Main program will call ChatBot for a goodbye message

- ChatBot will always be called Lee Kuan Yew
- Removed useless functionality of storing name

commitResults.messageTitle: Add partial list logic to ChatBot
commitResults.messageBody:
- Switch case added to allow for differing user input
- Implemented logic to add tasks to list
- Yet to implement functionality to retrieve the list

- Empty list returns a message
- Otherwise, tasks are listed out with serial numbers

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new Task class to handle task logic
commitResults.messageBody: - Task class will contain description and done boolean

- Instead of retrieving description, we override the toString method
- toString will also display the checkbox required based on whether the
  task is done

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement response logic for task marking
commitResults.messageBody:
- Users can now mark and unmark tasks
- Custom messages added for all scenarios, including exceptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix minor spacing issues in displayed text

commitResults.messageBody: - missing '.' after the number when retrieving list
- New task types will now extend Task
- Stores String parameter for deadline
- unknown modifications that were missed from the last commit unsure why
- Stores start and end dates as Strings

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement new task logic in ChatBot class
commitResults.messageBody:
- Todo, Deadline, Event tasks can now be added to the list
- Aprropriate responses and logic implemented
- To add error handling for invalid inputs

commitResults.messageTitle: Edit runtest files with correct file paths
Add error messages for invalid inputs
commitResults.messageBody:
- invalid input formats for deadline and event tasks
- other misc invalid inputs handled as well

- Users able to delete tasks from list
- Error handling for invalid numbers to avoid program crashing
- Misc text changes added

commitResults.messageTitle: Add getDescription method to Task class
EventTask class: Add getters for start and end dates
Storage: Add class to save and load tasks

commitResults.messageBody:
Users can use "save" command to save their current list of tasks. List
will be loaded on the next instance of launching the program, preserving
the data between each session.

List data is kept in data/LeeKuanYew.txt.

commitResults.messageTitle: DeadlineTask: Restructure deadline to LocalDate type
Storage class: Misc fixes and line spacing changes
